description.message: Adds infinite scroll, site icons, server locations, "View image" button, "Download image" button and more to Google search.

show_jump_to_related_searches_btn_label_.message: Show jump to related searches/pagination buttons

show_page_indicator_label_text.message: Show total total number of loaded pages/current page indicator

theme_help_text.message: If you use a custom Google Search theme and some features of the Google Enhancement Suite are not working, you'll need to change settings on this page. Why? Because in some cases Google Enhancement Suite checks HTML elements' HSV value to get elements it needs. For example, if your custom theme uses hsv(215, 38%, 90%) as a color for links in search results, the extension will not find link elements (as result, site and server location icons will not appear), because by default it expects saturation of links to be 50% (0.5) or higher. To fix this you will need to set the value of the "Link min saturation" input to 0.38 or lower.

scroll_to_top_title.message:
Left-click to go to top. (Tab: Enter)

Right-click to go to bottom. (Tab: Ctrl + Enter)

When you go to top or bottom Google Enhancement Suite remembers your position. To return to this position middle-click. (Tab: Shift + Enter)

You can also remember your position without going to top or bottom. To do this, middle-click, if Google Enhancement Suite doesn't have a position remembered, or click and hold middle button for 0.35 second if it does. (Tab: Alt + Enter)

img_downloads_dir_help_text.message: A path to the folder in the downloads folder, where downloaded images will go. May contain subfolders. Must not contain characters prohibited by the operating system. If the folder does not exist, it will be created on the first download. Leave empty to download images into the default folder. Example: !Google/Images

show_copy_img_btn_help_text.message: Not all apps will accept images copied with this button. In these cases you will need to copy images the usual way - via browser context menu.

jump_to_related_searches_title.message: Click to jump to related searches/pagination buttons. Click again or middle-click the scroll to top button to return to the previous position.

load_end_msg_error_text.message: An error occured. Google thinks you're a robot. Reload the page and solve the captcha.‎

welcome_notification.message: Thank you for installing Google Enhancement Suite. The country flags will take some time to load for the first time. Please wait.

remember_scroll_position_hotkey.message: Remember scroll position/return to the remembered scroll position

remember_scroll_position_forced_hotkey.message: Remember scroll position (if Google Enhancement Suite already have a position remembered)
